question:
With reference to the share of public and private sector in healthcare in India, Consider the following observations:
1. While private sector dominates in the outpatient care, public sector dominates in the inpatient care
2. While private sector dominates in urban region, public sector dominates in rural region Which among the above is / are correct options?
explanation: Private Sector has 80% share in outpatient care and 60% share in inpatient care. (Draft National Health Policy 2015) Private medical sector remains the primary source of health care for 70% of households in urban areas and 63% of households in rural areas. (Wikipedia)
